page.title: 02The Domesday Flight
page.content: brief talk about the{Islander}and checked our seating position. The time went by very slowly but at last it was our turn to board the plane which had just landed. I was a little nervous, not having flown before, but once seated and strapped in I became quite excited. With my camera firmly in hand we began to taxi down the perimeter track to a holding point. The engines were quite noisy but became even louder as we raced down the runway and then became{airborne.}I felt myself fall back and could do nothing but gaze at the view below as we climbed higher and higher. The pilot said we had only reached 1500 ft. Only, I thought! Everything was so much smaller and you could see the entire layout of the towns, villages and roads far below. As we flew over a{cricket match,}the
